import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import Dashboard from'./components/Dashboard';import Login from'./components/Login';import Register from'./components/Register';import Transactions from'./components/Transactions';import Budgets from'./components/Budgets';import AddTransaction from'./components/AddTransaction';import AddBudget from'./components/AddBudget';import{AuthContext}from'./context/AuthContext';import'./App.css';import{AuthProvider}from'./context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){// Verify token and get user data
fetch('/api/auth/me',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{if(data.user){setUser(data.user);}}).catch(err=>console.error('Auth check failed:',err)).finally(()=>setLoading(false));}else{setLoading(false);}},[]);const login=(userData,token)=>{setUser(userData);localStorage.setItem('token',token);};const logout=()=>{setUser(null);localStorage.removeItem('token');};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{user,login,logout},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:!user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:!user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/transactions",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Transactions,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/transactions/add",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddTransaction,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/budgets",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Budgets,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/budgets/add",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddBudget,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"})})]})})]})});}export default App;
